name: Shadows below(Black and white jam #11)
description:
In Shadows below you have 2 task, spin the crank to decend and avoid all the enemies.

CREDITS:

Title:

Everything else:

---

CONTROLS:

E - interact with the crank.

M1 - Fire the blunderbus

M2 - Fire the flintlock pistol

ESCAPE - pause game
